categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Morgannier was a freighter owned by the SoroSuub Corporation during the Galactic Civil War.
It was stolen by Rebel Alliance agent Kn'ik Th'ronik from its docking bay on Ord Mantell. SoroSuub then posted a reward for Th'ronik's capture and the return of the Morgannier.
